subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Marat Safin and Dmitry Tursunov beat Argentina’s David Nalbandian and Agustín Calleri on Saturday, 6-2, 6-3, 6-4, to put Russia one victory away from its second Davis Cup title.
snippet: Marat Safin and Dmitry Tursunov beat Argentina’s David Nalbandian and Agustín Calleri on Saturday, 6-2, 6-3, 6-4, to put Russia one victory away from its second Davis Cup title.
